short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View an author's books directly on her Twitter profile page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
While browsing the profile pages of authors on Twitter.com, this extension will display books that are written by those authors along with links directly to the books on Amazon.com.

Note: this extension only works for authors who have created author pages on Authorgraph.com.
